title: Stage Lv4-A5-S17
description: Level 4 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Thank you for your inquiry. (business variant 1)
I will be happy to assist you. (business variant 1)
learning_points: Level 4 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Thank you for your inquiry. (business variant 1)
I will be happy to assist you. (business variant 1)
I can provide the information you requested. (business variant 1)
The procedure is as follows. (business variant 1)
Please contact us if you need further assistance. (business variant 1)
I will explain the service in detail. (business variant 1)
I have reviewed all available options. (business variant 1)
I understand your requirements. (business variant 1)
I suggest the best solution. (business variant 1)
You can contact us at any time. (business variant 1)
